query:
SELECT 
  v.id as vendaId,
  v.dataVenda,
  DATE(v.dataVenda) as dataVendaFormatada,
  v.valorTotal,
  p.id as pagamentoId,
  p.cvNsu,
  p.valor as valorPagamento,
  p.tipo,
  p.bandeira,
  CASE 
    WHEN DATE(v.dataVenda) = '2025-12-13' THEN 'MATCH'
    ELSE 'NO MATCH'
  END as status_matching
FROM vendas v
INNER JOIN pagamentos p ON p.vendaId = v.id
WHERE p.cvNsu IN ('176726822', '27410510', '175329394', '26402146')
  AND p.tipo IN ('debito', 'credito')
  AND p.cvNsu IS NOT NULL 
  AND p.cvNsu != '';
command:

  v.id as vendaId,
  v.dataVenda,
  DATE(v.dataVenda) as dataVendaFormatada,
  v.valorTotal,
  p.id as pagamentoId,
  p.cvNsu,
  p.valor as valorPagamento,
  p.tipo,
  p.bandeira,
  CASE 
    WHEN DATE(v.dataVenda) = '2025-12-13' THEN 'MATCH'
    ELSE 'NO MATCH'
  END as status_matching
FROM vendas v
INNER JOIN pagamentos p ON p.vendaId = v.id
WHERE p.cvNsu IN ('176726822', '27410510', '175329394', '26402146')
  AND p.tipo IN ('debito', 'credito')
  AND p.cvNsu IS NOT NULL 
  AND p.cvNsu != '';
